IE 5301 Human Factors in Engineering and
Design
description:
This module will focus on the interaction dynamics between the human operator and the machine/system in a human-machine system. We shall begin by defining the areas of concern in human factors engineering (e.g., the humanmachine
interface, the displays to be perceived, and the controls to be actuated). We shall
discuss also the tools and methodologies used by a human factors engineer. The latter portion of the subject will discuss issues of capabilities and limitations of the human operator.
title: Humans and Systems Engineering
